channel.title: Best of on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Best of on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: My Favorite Thoughts of 2013
item.description: When I set out on this project, I was as clear as I could be about what this is. What it’s become, however, is one of my favorite parts of my day, every day for the past 62. While there is no goal to this project beyond to write more — nothing I’m trying to accomplish with the articles — there have been a few thoughts that have stuck out.
